main.name: Giacomo Li
main.bio: I am an experienced web and mobile developer with 11 years of work experience in web/mobile development.
main.bio1: As a Top-notch web and mobile developer, I have high skills in modern javascript frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue. Moreover, I love building a production-level iOS/Android apps using React Native. In addition to building high-performance, beautiful frontend, I am also familiar with building the well-structured backend using Node, Django, GraphQL, Firebase.
main.bio2: I follow the Steve Jobs quote 'Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish' and that makes me build successful results in my career. 'Stay Hungry' to try out new ideas, technologies and to innovate continuously. 'Staying foolish' to know that there is always scope for improvement and try hard to win at business marketing and engaging better with visitors.
main.bio3: My main goal is to make good prospects for the company by working properly, professionally and efficiently. After many years of working under different situations, I have developed the skills required to effectively communicate, plan and manage projects. I maintain a healthy balance between user satisfaction and code quality in every project.
main.bio4: I love working with great people, inspiring others, and being inspired.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: - Studying and Developing under 'Harder Choices and Easy Life'

work.title: Senior Javascript/Python Engineer
work.description: - Enjoy bringing value to clients via eCommerce solutions, legacy integrations, and optimized Python and JavaScript-driven applications.
work.description1: - Have worked on various industries including eLearning Platform, eCommerce Platform, Insurance Marketplace, Real Estate & Construction Platforms
work.description2: Technologies: React/React Native, Angular, Vue, Node.js, Next.js, Gatsby.js, Django, Sentry, Mocha, Puppeteer, Laravel

work.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
work.description: - Currently Looking For Full-Time Remote Contract

work.description2: - Place a high priority on customer satisfaction, easy to work with, and comfortable in agile environments.
work.description3: Technologies: React, React Native, Node, Django, Angular, Vue, GraphQL, Next.js, Laravel, Gatsby.js

work.title: Senior React Developer
work.description: - Designed and implemented responsive websites and developed cross-platform apps
work.description1: - Developed a real-time trading graph using D3.js which has tickers for seven days, one day, one hour, and instant; built it all from scratch.
work.description2: - Customize the Serverless/AWS project depends on Gatsby.js and Next.js

work.title: Lead React Native Developer
work.description: -Designed the entire mobile application to be able to function offline for long periods of time and sync data back once in cell reception.
work.description1: - Developed front-end mobile applications for a variety of services and integrated native SDKs using React Native and built SPAs, PWAs using React and Redux
work.description2: - Re-architecting the product using 100% JavaScript (Node.js, React, and React Native), where every engineer is a full-stack one and can work on any portion of the system.
work.description3: Technologies: React Native, GraphQL/Apollo, Typescript, React, Redux, Ionic Framework, iOS-development, Mocha, Sentry

work.title: Full Stack Developer / MEAN focus

work.description2: - Developed the front-end using mainly Angular.
work.description3: Technologies: Angular, JavaScript, Node, Docker, CS Modules, Webpack, WebSocket

testimonials.text: Giacomo has an incredible mind for product architecture and business development. It is difficult to find someone who can master an understanding of code, perfect financial models, and pitch an entire company all at the same time. He is also a former professional software engineer with big experience!
testimonials.user: Henri Nicolas - Worked at HDPE Closures Department @ Co-Founder LDOC, Universidad Simón

testimonials.text: Giacomo Li has a great attitude and always professional. Great Team member with a long time journey under successful career
